message:
Anyone facing the same Windows 10 Wifi , Search and menu problems "I know there is a lot !", will new updates solve it or it will make it worse :S
----------------------- Updates
However i think anyone  has Windows 10 now will know what im talking about :) but this is what im facing 

1- Occasionally disconnecting from Wifi
2- When you try to click Wifi Icon Nothing  happen
3- When You Open Start Menu "If it opened" will not allow you to search 
Besides all of Windows Store Apps are not functioning any more after trying the famous fix of re-installing all Store Packages

data.message: You need to put more information in your questions my friend, nobody will help if the question is that vague.

However i think anyone  has Windows 10 now will know what im talking about :) but this is what im facing 

1- Occasionally disconnecting from Wifi
2- When you try to click Wifi Icon Nothing  happen
3- When You Open Start Menu "If it opened" will not allow you to search 
Besides all of Windows Store Apps are not functioning any more after trying the famous fix of re-installing all Store Packages

Is your networks problem started happening after upgrading to Windows 10 for this device only? is it happening on any router you connect to?
Have you checked if your wifi manufacturer released an updated driver recently?

I rarely get an issue were the start menu and all store apps refuse to open, I discovered the fix for it, go the task manager and stop all store apps running in the background (previously I had to restart to fix this)

انا بستخدم ال 10 بقالى 4 شهور و مقابلتش اى مشكلة من دول نهاءى... 
الواىفاى و ال store شغاليين تمام معايا و مفيش اى عيوب... و ال elastic search تمام برضه... 
غير النسخة الى عندك ممكن يكون العيب فيها...

كان عندى مشاكل كتير اول ما استخدمت 10 على لابتوب g5080 لينوفو
يفضل تدخل على موقع الشركه المصنعه للابتوب علشان تنزل ال driver الخاصه بالجهاز وماتعتمدش على الويندوز انه يجيبها بالذات فى اللابتوب يعنى عندى جهاز ديسكتوب hp وبعتمد على الويندوز علشان غالبا ويندوز عامل تيست كويس على الاجهزه المتعارف عليها فى حاله اللابتوب الموضوع مش درايفر بس لا فى حالات كتير الشركات المصنعه بتنزل prefix -patches -utility tools 
بتبقى مفيده جدا لان غالبا الموديل الواحد بيبقى عباره عن تجميعه لاجزاء من شركات تانيه وغيره
